title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message: 2936 that does not detect webcam, already tried 2 different display assemblies. Where should i start?

title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message: webcam is a USB device, check voltage on pin 6 and diode mode on pins 2 and 3... Also could be a bad L3407 ....

title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message:
Pin 6 is strange, it goes up and down between 1.1v and 3.4v

and diode mode on pins

pin 2 -1.75
pin 3 -1.73

and L3407 seems good compare to known good board.

title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message: Ok discovered that L3408 was visibly bad and i replaced it, now i get 5v on pin 6 and the green webcam led lights up but there is no image in facetime or photobooth, not even the no camera logo its just black.

title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message: Replace L3407. It can measure fine on a meter but still not be sufficiently well to pass high speed data.

title: 820-2936 with No Webcam
message: Camera is dead, that is also what fried the coil in the first place. Try with known good camera.
